basic_information.scholarship_name: Liberal Arts Student Organization Officer Scholarship

description: This scholarship recognizes the outstanding efforts of a Liberal Arts student organization officer. Must be nominated by CLA faculty to apply. Eligibility Requirements Must be serving the first term as a Liberal Arts student organization officer Full-time student Liberal Arts major Minimum GPA of 3.0 Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
